title: Can I Build the CHEAPEST MacBook?
description: Refurbished MacBook Air from Newegg:  The @Denki video on the screenless MacBook trend  The excellent @lukemiani video that inspired me  The tutorial I used to create the OpenCore Legacy Patcher:   By using our affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 Can I Find the Cheapest MacBook? 1:59 Unboxing My MacBook 2:55 Hardware Condition 3:44 Does It Work? 5:26 There's Your Problem 6:28 Installing macOS 8:00 Repasting CPU & GPU 9:35 Fixing the Hinge 11:25 MacBook Upgrades 12:35 The Reveal 13:41 Upgrading with OpenCore 15:40 Was It Worth It?
